class.rdfs:comment: A means for accessing a service, e.g. a government office location, web site, or phone number.
class.rdfs:label: ServiceChannel

schema:availableLanguage.rdfs:comment: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also inLanguage
schema:availableLanguage.rdfs:label: availableLanguage

schema:processingTime.rdfs:comment: Estimated processing time for the service using this channel.
schema:processingTime.rdfs:label: processingTime

schema:providesService.rdfs:comment: The service provided by this channel.
schema:providesService.rdfs:label: providesService

schema:serviceLocation.rdfs:comment: The location (e.g. civic structure, local business, etc.) where a person can go to access the service.
schema:serviceLocation.rdfs:label: serviceLocation

schema:servicePhone.rdfs:comment: The phone number to use to access the service.
schema:servicePhone.rdfs:label: servicePhone

schema:servicePostalAddress.rdfs:comment: The address for accessing the service by mail.
schema:servicePostalAddress.rdfs:label: servicePostalAddress

schema:serviceSmsNumber.rdfs:comment: The number to access the service by text message.
schema:serviceSmsNumber.rdfs:label: serviceSmsNumber

schema:serviceUrl.rdfs:comment: The website to access the service.
schema:serviceUrl.rdfs:label: serviceUrl
